pr_title: Feature: Clean up participation and restart tour

timeline.message: Optimize subscriptions and remove method from PersonClass task
Add test for currentCourse and currentExercise
Allow USER and TA to delete their own participations
Update ParticipationResource method and fix server tests

timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: At first I have implemented a new API endpoint for deleting participations for tutorial exercises, but then I remembered that you once mentioned that it should be possible for tutors and student to delete their own participation in the future. As suggested by you, I will add another check logic here :)
replies.author: lovaiible

timeline.bodyText: why do you call this mock settings? isn't this just simple test data?
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: Agreed, I will change the naming of the method :)
replies.author: lovaiible

timeline.message: Add guided tour mapping check on the server

timeline.author: ungaralex

timeline.author: ungaralex
ungaralex

timeline.bodyText:
You should implement equals and hashCode in GuidedTourSetting and then delete the setting from the set in the user entity using this.guidedTourSettings.remove(setting). Looping over the set is not best practice.
One additional question: Shouldn't we move the guided tour related methods to a GuidedTourService? Not really in the scope of this PR, but if I were to work on guided tours, my initial intuition would be to look for such a service, and not in the UserService. Additionally, this service already has almost 600 LoC.
timeline.author: ungaralex

replies.bodyText: As discussed, this is not possible because I don't have the guidedTourSetting object but only the key as string :(
replies.author: lovaiible

timeline.bodyText: You don't need this since the save operation on the user repository will already update the bidirectional relation and the orphanRemoval=true setting will remove the GuidedTourSetting on flush.
timeline.author: ungaralex

replies.bodyText: It works without the save operation. Thank you for the suggestion :)
replies.author: lovaiible

timeline.message: Add 'restart tutorial' label to account menu
Add loading indicator when restarting a tutorial
Move deletion of participation for guided tour to its own REST call
Update client test and run prettier

timeline.author: krusche

timeline.author: krusche

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/service/UserService.java b/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/service/UserService.java
index ee839292e7..25b39ae5e3 100644
--- a/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/service/UserService.java
+++ b/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/service/UserService.java

@@ -641,7 +641,7 @@ public class UserService {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Delete a given guided tour setting of the currently logged in user
+     * Delete a given guided tour setting of the currently logged in user (e.g. when the user restarts a guided tutorial)
      * @param guidedTourSettingsKey the key of the guided tour setting that should be deleted
      * @return the updated user object without the deleted guided tour setting
      */

timeline.author: krusche
krusche

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * DELETE guided-tour/participations/:participationId : delete the "participationId" participation of student participations for guided tours.
          
          
            
                 * DELETE guided-tour/participations/:participationId : delete the "participationId" participation of student participations for guided tutorials (e.g. when restarting a tutorial)
          
          
            
                 * Please note: all users can delete their own participation when it belongs to a guided tutorial
timeline.author: krusche

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/web/rest/ParticipationResource.java b/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/web/rest/ParticipationResource.java
index 2a23f8f64e..59bbbb5ffa 100644

+++ b/src/main/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/web/rest/ParticipationResource.java

@@ -600,7 +600,8 @@ public class ParticipationResource {
     }
 
     /**
-     * DELETE guided-tour/participations/:participationId : delete the "participationId" participation of student participations for guided tours.
+     * DELETE guided-tour/participations/:participationId : delete the "participationId" participation of student participations for guided tutorials (e.g. when restarting a tutorial)
+     * Please note: all users can delete their own participation when it belongs to a guided tutorial
      *
      * @param participationId the participationId of the participation to delete
      * @param deleteBuildPlan True, if the build plan should also get deleted
